entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Shawinigan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:16 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shawinigan 6:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

Humidity: 61 %

Dewpoint: -28.7°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
